TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MessageElement extends MonoTouch.Dialog.Element implements class MonoTouch.Dialog.IElementSizing

Docs.summary: Element to display a mail message-like record with sender, subject, date, read/unread statuses.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

remarks.para: You typically create an instance of this object and then set the individual properties.

example.code: new MessageElement (msgSelected) { Sender = "Miguel de Icaza (mdeicaza.home@emailserver.com)", Subject = "Re: [Gtk-sharp-list] Glib Timeout and other ways to handle idle", Body = "Please bring friends, but make sure that you also bring eggs and bacon", Date = DateTime.Now - TimeSpan.FromHours (23), NewFlag = true, MessageCount = 0 }

Docs.param: The method to invoke when the item is tapped on by the user.

remarks.para: You typically create an instance of this object and then set the individual properties.

example.code: new MessageElement (msgSelected) { Sender = "Miguel de Icaza (mdeicaza.home@emailserver.com)", Subject = "Re: [Gtk-sharp-list] Glib Timeout and other ways to handle idle", Body = "Please bring friends, but make sure that you also bring eggs and bacon", Date = DateTime.Now - TimeSpan.FromHours (23), NewFlag = true, MessageCount = 0 }

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableViewCell GetCell(class MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableView tv) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a UITableViewCell for this element. Can be overridden, but if you customize the style or contents of the cell you must also override the CellKey property in your derived class.
Docs.remarks: This is part of the machinery required by UITableView. This method is only ever used by developers creating new MonoTouch.Dialog Elements and is not intended to be used by consumers of the API.
